articles.title: Hi!
articles.contents:
Download complete CV from here.
Summary
I am a research fellow in Statistics at the University of Milan - Bicocca, Department of Economics, Management and Statistics (DEMS). My main research interests are spatial and spatiotemporal models on road networks.
Education
PhD in Statistics and Mathematical Finance, 2021, University of Milano - Bicocca
MSc in Statistical (with honors), 2017, University of Milano - Bicocca
BSc in Statistical (with honors), 2015, University of Milano - Bicocca
Main publications
Gilardi, A., Borgoni, R., Mateu, J., A non-separable first-order spatio-temporal intensity for events on linear networks: an application to ambulance interventions. Under review. Preprint.
Gilardi, A., Mateu, J., Borgoni, R., Lovelace, R., Multivariate hierarchical analysis of car crashes data considering a spatial network lattice. Under review. Preprint.
Gilardi, A., Lovelace, R., Padgham, M. Data structures and methods for reproducible street network analysis: overview and implementations in R. Under review. Preprint.
Borgoni, R., Gilardi, A., & Zappa, D. (2020). Assessing the Risk of Car Crashes in Road Networks. Social Indicators Research, 1-19.

Andrea Gilardi

            Andrea Gilardi
          
          
            
              Hi! I am a research fellow at the University of Milano - Bicocca. I work mainly on spatial and spatio-temporal models on road networks. I love hiking and coding with R.
